title: Why can't I switch between chronological and discussion on NA Boards?
body: I could some time ago and it's still a thing on EUNE. Why was it removed here? OR am I missing something?

replies.body: It's still there!  It's right above the reply box.  If it's not showing up for you, double check your extensions in case something is blocking it, or clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)!

I can see it now, when I came here from my notifications (the massage icon on upper-right corner), but when I open a discussion from Boards there is no such option. I am stuck on chronological view. There is the "DISCUSS" text and right next are comments, no switch button

Hey Pikol, I think you may be going to General Discussion or Player Recruitment? Neither of those boards have Discussion View enabled, so you won't be able to switch off Chronological there. The rest of the boards have it, so let me know if you can't do it elsewhere.
Oh, yeah, you are right. Didn't know about this. Thanks
